text: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمۡ يَنتَهِ لَنَسۡفَعَۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ
translation: Rárá (ọ̀rọ̀ kò rí bí ọ̀tá Allāhu ṣe rò ó sí.[1]) Dájúdájú tí kò bá jáwọ́ (níbi dídí Ànábì - kí ìkẹ́ àti ọlà Allāhu máa bá a - lọ́wọ́), dájúdájú A máa fi àásó orí² rẹ̀ wọ́ ọ (sínú Iná);
footnotes: 1. Ẹni yẹn ni Abu Jahl. 2. àásó orí; irun iwájú orí.
